name: Lunacy (itch) (Lolscrubs)
description:
Lunacy is a backrooms inspired horror game that includes 3 unique levels, both playable in a normal and a nightmare mode

Every level has entities chasing the player, each with their own AI and behaviour.

The first level the backrooms "Lobby" level based on a retail store.

The second level is a fever dream you had as a kid that gets more and more blurry the harder you try to remember it.

The third level is Edvard Grieg's "In the hall of the mountain king".


ESC + X - INSTANT QUIT

WASD - MOVE

MOUSE - LOOK

LMB - ZOOM *

SPACE - JUMP *

*= works not in every level

{html.missing_element} MB Space

Dual Core CPU

2GB RAM

512 MB VRAM

Mouse and Keyboard
